name: opendistro-anomaly-detection-kibana
description: Open Distro for Elasticsearch Anomaly Detection Kibana plugin

scripts.build: yarn plugin-helpers build && echo Renaming artifact to $npm_package_config_odfe_name-$npm_package_config_odfe_version.zip && mv ./build/$npm_package_config_odfe_name*.zip ./build/$npm_package_config_odfe_name-$npm_package_config_odfe_version.zip
scripts.test:e2e: CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=1 CYPRESS_responseTimeout=180000 WAIT_ON_TIMEOUT=900000 start-server-and-test 'cd ../../ && yarn start --no-base-path --oss && cd plugins/anomaly-detection-kibana-plugin' http-get://localhost:5601/app/opendistro-anomaly-detection-kibana 'echo sleeping to wait for server to get ready && sleep 180 && yarn cy:run'
